title: Barlavento
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located around 14 km (8.7 miles) from the center of Caxias do Sul, Barlavento is part of a complex called Rio do Vento (also known as Morangos Hidropônicos), mainly dedicated to the production of organic, hydroponic strawberries and cherry tomatoes. Serves mains, sandwiches, pastas, soups, creams, drinks, and dessert with several vegetarian options. Rio do Vento also includes an inn built in a restored farm house originally from the 19th century.
